chunk:
Devita Hyaluronic Intensive Seru Gel (2020 formulation)

Brand: Devita

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE*, GLYCERIN, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, FUCUS VESICULOSUS EXTRACT, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, PROPANEDIOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POTASSIUM SORBATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
